articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Vietnamese Party Chief
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Vietnamese Party Chief
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Friday sent a congratulatory message to Nong Duc Manh, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, on his 70th birthday.
					 It says:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you on your 70th birthday.
					
					 I am pleased with the great successes being achieved by the people of your country in the efforts to build rich and powerful and prosperous Vietnam under the guidance of the CPV with you as general secretary.
					
					 Believing that the friendly relations between the two parties would continue to grow strong thanks to the concerted efforts, I sincerely wish you fresh success in your responsible work for carrying out the tasks advanced by the 10th Party Congress and good health.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party and president of Syria, Friday on the occasion of his 45th birthday.
					 The message says:
					
					 I extend warm felicitations to you on your 45th birthday.
					
					 Under your correct leadership the Syrian government and people are making steady progress in the work for the country's development and modernization, overcoming manifold difficulties and trials.
					
					 Being convinced that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries with a long history and tradition will further develop under the joint care, I heartily wish you good health and happiness and greater successes in the work for the country's prosperity and the fair settlement of the Mideast issue.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on his 45th birthday.
					 Kim in the message hoped that the president would always enjoy good health and happiness and achieve steady successes in his noble work for the country and people, expressing conviction that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Syria would continue to grow strong in line with the aspiration and desire common to the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Chinese Delegations Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Chinese delegations arrived here Friday by air to participate in the Second Forum of the DPRK-China University Presidents. 
					 Among them are a delegation of the Ministry of Education, a delegation of universities of China made up of officials of Jilin University, Zhongshan University, Harbin Engineering University, Liaoning University, Fuduan University, Tianjin University,  Nankai University, Dailan Science and Engineering University, Dongbei University, Dongbei Normal University and Yangzhou University and a delegation of the Local Association of International Friendly Contact of China  including officials of its provincial and city associations for international friendly contact.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in China
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in China
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Sept. 8 on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were a vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, a vice-minister of Railways, He Jung, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Wu Donghe, chairman of the Sino-Korea Friendship Association, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were Ambassador Choe Pyong Gwan and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech at the reception that since the foundation of the DPRK its people have built a socialist land of bliss, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation, greatly contributing to protecting the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, the rest of Northeast Asia and the world.
					
					The China visit paid by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in August after his visit to China in last May marked a great event of landmark significance in the history of the friendly relations between the DPRK and China, he said, reiterating the DPRK's positive efforts to further deepen the friendly relations between the two countries as required by the present century.
					
					 The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China said in a speech that the Korean people have registered steady successes in their vigorous drive to build a thriving nation under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, adding that China is sincerely rejoiced over them. He wished the Korean people fresh greater successes in all fields.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship personally provided and fostered by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries stood the test and has become precious assets common to the two parties, the two countries and the two peoples, he noted, stressing that the Chinese people would join the Korean comrades in the efforts to further strengthen the exchange and cooperation in various domains in the spirit of "inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" and thus steadily boost the bilateral relations.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Russia
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Sept. 7 on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there were O Sung Ho, DPRK charge d'affaires a.i., and embassy officials.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Zhirinovsky, deputy speaker of the State Duma of Russia, Saltanov, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and personages of Just Russia, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Defence, the Ministry of Regional Development, the Ministry of Economy and Development, the Ministry of Culture, the Academy of Sciences, the Moscow city government, the Moscow War Veterans' Committee, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and other figures of the parliament, ministries of the government, political parties, organizations and institutions.
					
					 The participants in the reception placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung standing together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and looked round works of the peerlessly great persons and photos showing the history of victory and glory of the DPRK on display at the venue of the function.
					
					 O Sung Ho said in his speech at the reception that it was the consistent stand of the DPRK government to invariably boost the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative ties with a long history and tradition, reiterating the DPRK's will to exert positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in line with the spirit of the Korea-Russia joint documents and the inter-state treaty in the future, too.
					
					 The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia declared that Russia would invariably boost the mutually beneficial relations in all fields including politics, economy and culture with the DPRK, a close neighbor, and make steady efforts to attain the common goal for creating conditions for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and its security and the peace in the region and socio-economic development as it did in the past.

articles.title: 12th Int'l Film Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
12th Int'l Film Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The 12th Pyongyang International Film Festival will be held in the DPRK.
					 The festival is an international event which provides movie persons of several countries with an opportunity to swap their successes and experience gained in creating cinematic art and boost the exchange and cooperation in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 The festival slated to take place from Sep. 17 to 24 will witness the screening of films contributed by dozens of countries.
					
					 It will involve contests in full-length feature films, documentary and short films and special and information shows as well as meetings for exchanging films.
					
					 Also involved in it are previews of Korean films.

articles.title: Int'l Workshop on Wind Energy Technology Held
articles.content:
Int'l Workshop on Wind Energy Technology Held
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The international wind energy technology workshop was held at the People's Palace of Culture between Sep. 6 and 10 under the sponsorship of the Pyongyang International New Technological and Economic Information Centre.
					 Among the participants were officials of ministries and national institutions and those in the field of scientific researches and wind energy experts.
					
					 Also attending it were Stefan Gsanger, secretary-general of the World Wind Energy Association, and wind energy experts of Germany and China.
					
					 The workshop was held on the subjects of the development of wind energy in the DPRK and the rest of the world and its prospect, designing and manufacturing technology of wind power generators, assessment of their qualities, test and measurement of the generators, etc.
					
					 The participants of the workshop also exchanged successes and experience gained in the work to develop wind energy.

articles.title: New Strain of Rice Bred
articles.content:
New Strain of Rice Bred
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A new strain of rice suitable for double cropping has been produced in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 A farm in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang, has planted the high-yield strain whose growing period is shorter and consumption of fertilizers per hectare lower than other strains.
					
					 The new strain does not need plastic sheet in cultivating rice seedlings.
					
					 It was highly evaluated at the National Festival of Science and Technology held in April.

articles.title: National Ssirum Tournament to Be Held
articles.content:
National Ssirum Tournament to Be Held
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The 8th National Ssirum Tournament for Grand Bull Prize will be held on Rungna Islet in Pyongyang from Sept. 13 to 15.
					 The ssirum (Korean wrestling) tournament including two events, body-weight and catch-weight, will be participated in by some 100 players selected from eleven provinces and municipalities.
					
					 A grand bull and a gold cowbell will go to the winner of the catch-weight event.
					
					The top favorite for the prize is Ri Jo Won from North Phyongan Province who won the catch-weight event at the 7th tournament held last year.
					
					 But it is hard to foresee the tournament's results as lots of fine players have come out from different areas of the country.
					
					The open-weight event will start on the afternoon of Sept. 14 after the windup of the body-weight event.
					
					 In the past seven tournaments players from Pyongyang won six.
					
					 As of August 26, the weight of the grand bull was 950 kilograms.

articles.title: Recreation Centers Full of Holidaymakers
articles.content:
Recreation Centers Full of Holidaymakers
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Health resorts and rest centers throughout the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now crowded with holidaymakers.
					 The Myohyangsan Rest Center delights the recreationists through such program as visit to the International Friendship Exhibition House and ascent of Mt. Myohyang, while the Onpho Rest Center in North Hamgyong Province provides diverse services, including spa and sea bathing, folk amusements and sports games.
					
					 Workers of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and their family members enjoy themselves in the Sohungho Rest Center, enjoying angling, boating and others.
					
					 The Sokdamgugok, Songdan and other resorts are also popular among holidaymakers for their well-equipped cultural facilities.
					
					 Many industrial establishments, including the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the Taedonggang Battery Factory and the Rakwon Machine Complex, have their own rest centers.
					
					 Kwon Phil Su, director of the Recreation Department of the Ministry of Labor, told KCNA that the holidaymakers, indebted to the socialist system for their recreation, made a fresh determination during their vacations to repay its advantages by striving hard for the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: End to US Forces' Presence in S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
End to US Forces' Presence in S. Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- It is impossible to achieve the sovereignty of the nation and the peace of the country and national reunification as long as the U.S. imperialists' aggression forces are present in south Korea. This is the lesson taught to the Koreans by the 65-year-long military presence of the U.S. imperialists in south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The U.S. military occupation of south Korea was an arbitrary practice perpetrated by an aggressor as it violated the desire and right of the Koreans to achieve independent development, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The history of the U.S. occupation of south Korea was a blood-stained history of crimes committed by the horrible man-killers and brazen-faced aggressors and a history of vicious anti-reunification plots as it persistently blocked the concord and reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists brutally massacred at least one million innocent south Koreans in just five years after their occupation of south Korea and more than 1. 24 million others during the past Korean War. Their monstrous massacre of Koreans continued in the post-war period, too. The human and material damage inflicted by the U.S. imperialists upon Koreans after their occupation of south Korea amounted to trillions of U.S. dollars.
					
					 It was the U.S. that orchestrated "May 16 Military Coup" in the 1960s to dampen the desire for reunification which rapidly grew strong in south Korea under the slogan "Let us go north, come south and let us meet at Panmunjom!". It was again the U.S. that unrolled a separatist policy and cooked up the Yusin dictatorial regime to dash the hope and expectation of all the Koreans towards reunification when they mounted after the publication of the July 4 joint statement which clarified the three principles of national reunification in the 1970s.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. that escalated the Team Spirit joint military exercises as soon as multi-channeled dialogues and contacts kicked off between the north and the south in the 1980s and blocked the dynamic movement for national reunification by resuming the Team Spirit joint military exercises and kicking up an anti-DPRK nuclear racket when it was under way in the north and the south and overseas in the 1990s.
					
					 This year the U.S. prodded the south Korean puppet forces into fabricating a warship case and is now staging ceaseless provocative exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK under the pretext of this case.
					
					 It is the firm will of the Korean nation to put an end to the foreign presence in south Korea, a source of misfortune and disgrace.

articles.title: Release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Demanded
articles.content:
Release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Christian Measure Committee for Reverend Han Sang Ryol's Visit to the North for Implementing the June 15 Declaration in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Sept. 7 demanding the release of the reverend, a reunification champion. 
					 The participants of the meeting charged that the authorities' detention of the reverend who visited the north at the risk of his life for the peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula is an infringement upon the conscience of a religionist.
					
					 They declared that it was a just deed for him to turn out in the struggle for reunification to bring earlier the day when Koreans can live together.
					
					 No matter how desperately the authorities may suppress his just activities, they can never stop the people from advancing for reunification, they held, strongly demanding his release.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed by Chongryon
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Sept. 8 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Chief Vice-Chairman of the Central Standing Committee Ho Jong Man and other officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of different circles in Japan and ambassadors and staff members of foreign embassies, representatives of international organizations and correspondents in Japan.
					
					 Ho Jong Man, addressing the reception, said that all Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan are greatly encouraged by the people in the homeland who are achieving signal successes in the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il with the conference of the Workers' Party of Korea just around the corner.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il's recent visit to China would be recorded in the history as a landmark event of weighty significance in boosting the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 He urged the Japanese government to come out in real earnest to settle Japan's past crimes and improve the DPRK-Japan relations on the basis of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.

articles.title: Release of S. Korean Reunification Champion Demanded
articles.content:
Release of S. Korean Reunification Champion Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Switzerland Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on August 26 demanding the release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol, reunification champion of south Korea.
					 Rev. Han visited the DPRK to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration together with fellow countrymen, the statement said, accusing the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea of charging Rev. Han with the violation of the "Security Law" and branding his meeting with compatriots in the north as "illegal."
					
					 Illegal was not Han's visit to the north but the south Korean authorities' arrest of him, the statement noted, declaring that the organizations would join all the Korean friends in demanding the south Korean authorities unconditionally and immediately set him free.
					
					 It called on the Western media not to keep mum about this criminal action of the Lee Myung Bak group any longer.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in Peru and seminars, round-table talks, lectures, photo exhibitions and film shows in Cambodia, Iran, Ethiopia and Brazil in the period from Aug. 30 to Sept. 5 to celebrate the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 On display in the venues of the exhibitions were works of President   Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on the undying feats the peerlessly great persons performed for the foundation of the DPRK and its strengthening and development and photos introducing the course of victory and glory covered by the DPRK.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said at a meeting that the foundation of the DPRK by the President was a great event of historical significance in accomplishing the global cause of socialism.
					
					 Felix Fernandes Torres, secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, said in his speech that the DPRK founded by the President is the one and only socialist country of Juche where the leader, the party and the masses formed a harmonious whole guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 The senior minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia noted at a seminar that the President actively supported the struggle of the peoples of Cambodia and other developing and non-aligned countries for independence and the building of a new society, hoping that the Korean people would creditably realize the lifelong desire of the President under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-stock Farm in a round-table talk highly praised Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK, as an outstanding strategist and peerlessly brilliant commander who liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and brought down the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, in the Korean War, demonstrating the might of the DPRK before the whole world.
					
					 The mayor of a city of Sao Paulo State of Brazil said in a lecture that they extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve national reunification on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Peru.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "Pyongyang Today", "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.

articles.title: Seminar on Work of Kim Il Sung Held in Guinea
articles.content:
Seminar on Work of Kim Il Sung Held in Guinea
 Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- A seminar on President     Kim Il Sung's work "For the Development of Agriculture in African Countries" took place at the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea on Aug. 27.
					  In the work, published on Aug. 31, Juche 70 (1981), the President stressed that if agricultural institutes are set up in Eastern and Western Africa and agricultural scientists and engineers from the DPRK and the countries concerned and neighboring countries conduct joint researches on agricultural science according to the actual conditions of African countries and a model is created and its examples are popularized, the Eastern and Western African countries will be able to develop agriculture rapidly and attain self-sufficiency in food.
					
					  Secouna Camara, director general of the institute and chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Farming Methods, said in his speech that the work is an encyclopedia indicating the way for developing agriculture in African countries.
					
					  He went on to say:
					
					  The Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea founded under the meticulous guidance and warm loving care of Kim Il Sung has turned into an effective research center for agricultural science dynamically propelling the agricultural development of not only Guinea but other African countries, strikingly displaying the vitality of the South-South cooperation.
					
					Today the institute is making signal achievements in the researches into agricultural science under the deep care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and greatly contributing to the agricultural development of Guinea.
					
					  We will as ever make deeper study of the said famous work and thoroughly embody it in all activities including the researches into agricultural science, thus always exalting the honor of the institute bearing the august name of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia el "Concierto de septiembre" de Orquesta Unhasu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia el "Concierto de septiembre" de Orquesta Unhasu
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio el "Concierto de septiembre" de la Orquesta Unhasu efectuado en ocasion del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					 En la escena iniciada con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional se pusieron diversas piezas, entre otras, el coro "Gran patria nuestra", el sexteto femenino y coro "Que flamee nuestra bandera de la Republica de tres colores" y el solo femenino y coro "Mi pais".
					
					  Mediante el concierto lleno del entusiasmo y optimismo revolucionarios y el sentimiento rico, los ejecutantes cantaron con gran emocion el aspecto feliz de las masas trabajadoras que gozan de una vida digna en el regazo de la RPDC, que bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il logra los prodigios y cambios seculares y prospera de dia en dia.
					
					 Tambien, mostraron bien la inmutable conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de consolidar con mas firmeza como baluarte invencible el regimen socialista de Corea centrado en las masas populares uniendose con una sola alma y voluntad en torno al partido.
					
					El Dirigente evaluo altamente los exitos de la funcion de los artistas de la Orquesta Unhasu y les dio agradecimiento expresando gran satisfaccion de que estos hayan realizado el excelente concierto con alto caracter ideo-artistico desplegando el espiritu de creacion revolucionario.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien los creadores y artistas de la citada orquesta haran dinamicas actividades creativas del arte revolucionario y combativo y estimularan con mas vigor al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea a la lucha por la realizacion de la causa de la construccion de gran potencia prospera.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Jang Song Thaek, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, secretarios del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del partido, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y los organos de las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a Nong Duc Manh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a Nong Duc Manh
 Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 10 un mensaje al Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, Nong Duc Manh, para felicitarle por su 70o cumpleanos.
					 La misiva senala:
					
					 Le hago llegar mis calurosas felicitaciones por el 70o cumpleanos de Vd.
					
					 Me alegro de que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de Vietnam presidido por el secretario general, el pueblo de vuestro pais alcanza grandes exitos en la lucha por construir Vietnam potente y prospero.
					
					 Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad entre nuestros dos partidos seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose por los esfuerzos conjuntos, le deseo de todo corazon buena salud y nuevos exitos en sus labores responsables para materializar las tareas presentadas en el 10o congreso del partido.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a Bashar Al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje a Bashar Al-Assad
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio este viernes un mensaje a Bashar Al-Assad, secretario regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS) y presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria para felicitarle el 45 aniversario de su nacimiento.
					 La misiva va como sigue:
					
					 Hago llegarle a Vd. mis calurosas felicitaciones por el 45o cumpleanos.
					
					 Bajo la acertada direccion de Vd., el gobierno y el pueblo de Siria alcanzan incesantes avances en la labor para lograr el desarrollo y la modernizacion del pais superando las dificultades y pruebas con que se tropiezan.
					
					 Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises, que tienen larga historia y tradicion, se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas bajo la atencion comun, le deseo de todo corazon a Vd. buena salud, felicidad y mayores exitos en su labor para la prosperidad del pais y la solucion imparcial del problema del Medio Oriente.

articles.title: Gobierno de la RPDC ofrece un banquete por el dia nacional
articles.content:
Gobierno de la RPDC ofrece un banquete por el dia nacional
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo un banquete por el 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					Asistieron aqui los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados quienes son combatientes patrioticos por la reunificacion, los funcionarios de ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los heroes, los benemeritos laborales, el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon y otras delegaciones de coreanos en ultramar, compatriotas, que llegaron a la patria socialista para festejar el 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC, y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Al pronunciar un discurso en la recepcion, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, dijo que mas de 60 anos de la RPDC son la historia de gloriosas actividades revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y continuo:
					
					 La idea y las hazanas del Presidente en materia de la construccion del Estado se defienden firmemente y se llevan adelante gracias al Dirigente.
					
					Al presentar y materializar por primera vez en la historia la idea y la teorias acerca de la construccion del Estado, centradas en el lider, el Dirigente convirtio a la RPDC en el Estado del Presidente
						 Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Ademas, defendio el destino de la patria y la nacion y transformo nuestra patria como una potencia ideo-politica, militar y cientifico-tecnica practicando generalmente la politica de Songun.
					
					Gracias al ardiente patriotismo, el amor por la nacion, la resuelta decision politica y las dinamicas actividades exteriores del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se inicio en esta tierra patria la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de junio, que avanza segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". Ademas, se hizo posible elevar la dignidad y la posicion de la Corea del Songun y fortalecer extraordinariamente la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana.
					
					La RPDC enaltecera al Presidente como eterno Sol del Juche, glorificara generacion tras generacion su idea y hazanas en materia de la construccion del Estado, defendera firmemente las lineas y politicas del PTC y las materializara a cabalidad, siguiendo a la direccion del Songun del Dirigente.

articles.title: Hay que acabar con la ocupacion norteamericana del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Hay que acabar con la ocupacion norteamericana del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Mientras que las tropas agresoras norteamericanas esten estacionadas en el Sur de Corea, no se puede lograr la soberania nacional ni la paz del pais ni la reunificacion de la patria. Esto es la leccion que saca la nacion coreana de la ocupacion militar norteamericana sobre el Sur de Corea durante 65 anos.
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este viernes y prosigue:
					
					La ocupacion militar del Sur de Corea por parte de Estados Unidos fue una arbitrariedad del agresor que frustro la aspiracion y violo los derechos de la nacion coreana al desarrollo independiente.
					
					La trayectoria de la presencia de tropas yanquis en el Sur de Corea es la historia de crimenes ensangrentados de los asesinos salvajes y gangsteres cinicos y de siniestros complots anti-reunificacion para obstaculizar persistentemente la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					En solo 5 anos despues de su ocupacion del Sur de Corea, los imperialistas norteamericanos asesinaron de manera salvaje a mas de un millon de habitantes inocentes, y en el tiempo de la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953), a mas de un millon 240 mil. La masacre prosigue hasta en el periodo posbelico. 
					
					Las perdidas humanas y materiales, que sufrieron los habitantes surcoreanos por la ocupacion, llegan a decenas de billones de US$.
					
					En la decada de 1960 cuando se alzaba en el Sur de Corea el clima por la reunificacion bajo la consigna de "Vamos al Norte, vengan al Sur y nos vemos en Phanmunjom", el imperio orquesto el "golpe Militar de Estado del 16 de mayo". En la decada de 1970 cuando la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, que ha aclarado los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, inspiraba en toda la nacion coreana la esperanza en la reunificacion, EE.UU. la quebro practicando la politica divisionista y fabricando el "poder" dictatorial de "renovacion".
					
					Ademas, en la decada de 1980 cuando se iniciaron los dialogos y contactos por diferentes vias entre ambas partes coreanas, los imperialistas norteamericanos ampliaron los ejercicios conjuntos militares "Team Spirit".
					
					En la decada de 1990 cuando se desarrollaba dinamicamente en el ambito pannacional, o sea, en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, lo estropearon reanudando ese simulacro conjunto y lanzando la campana nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Este ano, EE.UU. invento el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" instigando a los titeres surcoreanos y pretextandolo, desarrolla incesantemente los provocativos ejercicios belicos contra la RPDC. 
					
					Acabar con la ocupacion de las fuerzas extranjeras llena de desgracias y afrentas es la invariable voluntad de la nacion coreana.
